verses.text: \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w grows|strong="H5848"\w* \w faint|strong="H5848"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w pours|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* lament \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. Hear \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; let \w my|strong="H3068"\w* cry \w for|strong="H3588"\w* help come \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H8085"\w* hide \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* face \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* day \w of|strong="H3068"\w* distress. Incline \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w ear|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w*; answer \w me|strong="H8085"\w* quickly \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H8085"\w* \w call|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H5641"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* vanish \w like|strong="H3117"\w* smoke, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w my|strong="H5641"\w* bones burn \w like|strong="H3117"\w* glowing embers.

\w My|strong="H3615"\w* heart \w is|strong="H3117"\w* afflicted, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* withered \w like|strong="H3615"\w* grass; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* forget \w to|strong="H3117"\w* eat \w my|strong="H3615"\w* bread.
\w Through|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* loud groaning \w my|strong="H3588"\w* skin hangs \w on|strong="H3899"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* bones.
\w I|strong="H6963"\w* am like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* desert owl, like \w an|strong="H6963"\w* owl among \w the|strong="H6963"\w* ruins.

\w I|strong="H1961"\w* \w lie|strong="H1961"\w* awake; \w I|strong="H1961"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1819"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lone bird \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* housetop.

\w All|strong="H5921"\w* day \w long|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* enemies taunt \w me|strong="H5921"\w*; \w they|strong="H5921"\w* ridicule \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H1961"\w* curse \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* eaten ashes \w like|strong="H3117"\w* bread \w and|strong="H3117"\w* mixed \w my|strong="H3605"\w* drink \w with|strong="H3117"\w* tears

\w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3899"\w* \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* indignation \w and|strong="H3899"\w* wrath, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* picked \w me|strong="H3588"\w* up \w and|strong="H3899"\w* cast \w me|strong="H3588"\w* aside.

\w My|strong="H5375"\w* days \w are|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* lengthening shadows, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* wither \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* grass.

\w But|strong="H3117"\w* \w You|strong="H3117"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, sit enthroned \w forever|strong="H3117"\w*; \w Your|strong="H5186"\w* renown endures \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* generations.

\w You|strong="H5769"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* rise \w up|strong="H3427"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* compassion \w on|strong="H3427"\w* Zion, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H5769"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* show her \w favor|strong="H3068"\w*—\w the|strong="H3068"\w* appointed \w time|strong="H5769"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* come.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* servants delight \w in|strong="H6965"\w* \w her|strong="H6965"\w* stones \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w take|strong="H6965"\w* \w pity|strong="H2603"\w* \w on|strong="H7355"\w* \w her|strong="H6965"\w* dust.

\w So|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nations \w will|strong="H5650"\w* fear \w the|strong="H3588"\w* name \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* all \w the|strong="H3588"\w* kings \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* fear \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* glory.

\w For|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* rebuild Zion; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* appeared \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* turn \w toward|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* prayer \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* destitute; \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* despise \w their|strong="H3068"\w* prayer.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H6437"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* written \w for|strong="H8605"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* generation \w to|strong="H6437"\w* come, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* created \w may|strong="H3808"\w* praise \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5971"\w* \w He|strong="H5971"\w* looked \w down|strong="H3789"\w* \w from|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* heights \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w His|strong="H5971"\w* sanctuary; \w the|strong="H1984"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* gazed \w out|strong="H3789"\w* \w from|strong="H5971"\w* heaven \w to|strong="H1755"\w* earth
\w to|strong="H3068"\w* hear \w a|strong="H3068"\w* prisoner’s groaning, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* release \w those|strong="H3588"\w* condemned \w to|strong="H3068"\w* death,

\w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H8085"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w proclaim|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* name \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* Zion \w and|strong="H1121"\w* praise \w Him|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* Jerusalem,
\w when|strong="H3068"\w* peoples \w and|strong="H3068"\w* kingdoms assemble \w to|strong="H3068"\w* serve \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* broken \w my|strong="H3068"\w* strength \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* way; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* cut short \w my|strong="H3068"\w* days.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* say: “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H6031"\w* God, \w do|strong="H1870"\w* \w not|strong="H1870"\w* take \w me|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H6031"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*! \w Your|strong="H6031"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w* go \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w through|strong="H1870"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* generations.

\w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* beginning \w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w laid|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* foundations \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w earth|strong="H5927"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* heavens \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* work \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Your|strong="H5927"\w* hands.

\w They|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* perish, but \w You|strong="H6440"\w* remain; \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* \w all|strong="H6440"\w* wear \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H8064"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* garment. \w Like|strong="H8064"\w* clothing \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* change \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* passed \w on|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1992"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w remain|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w same|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* years \w will|strong="H1992"\w* never end.

\w The|strong="H3808"\w* children \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w Your|strong="H3808"\w* servants \w will|strong="H3808"\w* dwell securely, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* descendants \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w established|strong="H3808"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w You|strong="H3808"\w*.”
